title: Onboard a New Driver
description: A prospective driver has submitted an application. An agent must process it and activate the driver's account.

tasks.description: Review the driver's submitted application and documents (license, vehicle registration).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies all documents are present and valid.

tasks.description: Initiate a third-party background check for the applicant.
tasks.expected_outcome: A background check is successfully ordered.

tasks.description: Receive the results of the background check, which is 'Clear'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system updates the applicant's status.

tasks.description: Activate the driver's account, allowing them to start accepting rides.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver's account is made active.
